website_summaries.verdict: This small lamp mounts to your headboard and offers a convenient light that doesn't shine throughout the whole bedroom.
pros: Built with a flexible gooseneck for easy positioning
Light has the ability to dim

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect reading lamp.
customer_reviews.text: Just a great little reading lamp. Easy to mount, and includes all the hardware you need. Bright, focused light with sufficient dimming for late night reading. Easy to adjust for just the right angle for reduced glare. The only knock against it is the “night light” ring around the dimmer switch uses a blue LED, which should be an obvious no-no with what we know about blue light affecting sleep. Thankfully you can turn it off, but you can’t outright disable it; it needs to be turned off every time you use it. Would be five stars if they changed the LED color.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great work or reading light
customer_reviews.text: Ok, had this for about a week now and couldn’t be happier. I purchased this for my Crafter Wife and attached it to the side of her chair backrest so she can see her yarn better when she is crafting. She loves it. Once you get use to the touch light control of the nite lite versus the actual light, it’s easy to use and really helps her see to work on her projects, especially when using very thin, black yarns which are hard to work with. It was easy to install and keeps its shape as you adjust it as needed. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look and the initial quality seemed good but I'm having a problem with one of the two I purchased. The company contacted me and sent a replacement and it works fine. could not have been more pleased with how they handled the customer service.
customer_reviews.author: David Briscoe

customer_reviews.title: Bookshelf Display Lights
customer_reviews.text: I bought four of the Acegoo LED bedside reading lights to use as display lights for our bookshelves and couldn't be happier. They attach easily to the top of the bookcase and and can be adjusted to shine where I want it. I dimmed the lights to the lowest setting and the brightness is perfect. I also attached them to GE Z-Wave wireless smart plugs so they automatically go on at dusk and off at dawn (our home uses Samsung SmartThings to control the smart plugs).
customer_reviews.author: D. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Warm light, touch switch works for me!
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. The blue night light is only there when you want it. The dimmer feature is very good. The light produced is warm and comfortable for reading and for a bedroom environment. I mounted it to the headboard and will probably purchase a 2nd one for the other side of the bed, assuming that I won't stay single forever.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID

customer_reviews.title: Its great. It doesn't spread the light out like my ...
customer_reviews.text: Its great. It doesn't spread the light out like my old ones did. I can read at night without having to be on the edge of the bed so as not to disturb others.
customer_reviews.author: Shelkol

customer_reviews.title: A bit pricey, but well worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Elegant and practical. Doesn’t get hot like the one it replaced. That’s important if you have curious toddler grandkids. Doesn’t heat up the room and battle the air conditioner. The touch switch takes a little getting used to, but I like it. The dimmable feature and the blue “mood” light are very useful.
customer_reviews.author: William D. Becker

customer_reviews.title: Great Reading Light Solution
customer_reviews.text: This light is a great solution for reading in bed. It is attractive, simple in appearance and easy to install. Light is cool, dimmable, has a nice on/off function switch. This is just what we were looking for at a good price. Now our bedside tables are less cluttered.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy-to-install bedside lighting
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bedside lamp. Took me ten minutes to install two of them on a headboard (and half of that was looking for the hex wrench I'd foolishly put down on the duvet. I love the sleek profile, but the dimmer function absolutely rocks.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah C.

customer_reviews.title: Don't like the blue light
customer_reviews.text: The blue light is irritating. The desription made no mention that it would have a blue like that comes on, mean that instead of turning off and on to get brightness, darkness, You have to tap it an extra time. I didn't think it would be irritating, but after using it only a few times, it has proven to be. Installation was very easy, and it has a very nice appearance. The cord is thin and very long, which has really increased the versatility. I would recommend this, it is just going to take time for me to get used to double tapping "off" and single tapping "on."
customer_reviews.author: Robert C. Mustain

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp
customer_reviews.text: This product was exactly as advertised. A great bedside lamp, easy to install, east to focus the light where you want it, and nice variable intensity for the bright to low LED bulb. My wife is light sensitive. Now I can have focused targeted light on my reading while she sleeps. A great bedside lamp. Product looks and functions exactly as advertised, and has a nice design and look. And much less expensive than others I was considering. Now she wants one too and we will get rid of our traditional bedside lamps. My concern when ordering was this might be a little too “modern” for me. I’m 70, and love this lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. J

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and functional
customer_reviews.text: I built a custom headboard for my guest bed and attached 2 of these lights to it. Everyone loves them! The neck is a good length, dimming works well, and the beam is just the right width to be useful without being disruptive. It has several control modes: off, off with blue light on control button, on, hold to brighten, and hold to darken. Only downside is that the power wire must come out the bottom. There is no easy way to route it through the back of the unit without cutting wires or metal housing. Disappointing, but a subtle flaw that's easy to ignore.
customer_reviews.author: zjbdragon

customer_reviews.title: headboard  reading  light
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a light I could attach to the headboard that would put the light right on the page for pre sleep reading, without bothering my wife. The light attached easily and well...has been very secure...and allows moving the light to just where I want it. Light is bright enough for reading...but only illuminates one to two pages "Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: teamminsky

customer_reviews.title: Super-easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Most products like this have to be installed very carefull to ensure vertical positioning on wall. With the circular mounting base and a flange/set screw meanism for attaching the lamp to the mounting plate, this product is idiot-proof!
customer_reviews.author: James Lurie

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect light! Not too bright that it deserves my husband while I read but provides enough light for me to read my book in bed without straining. I was iffy about this light. I touch the button, it lights up blue, I touch it a second time, the light comes on, touch a third time, the light goes off. Very easy to use. My husband put this up on the wall next to the bed. It's great, especially with the flexible neck. I can put the light exactly where I need it depending on how I'm laying in bed. A must have if you like reading in bed and don't want to disturb your husband!
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Jane

customer_reviews.title: Great reading light
customer_reviews.text: Mounted these in the bedroom over the bed as reading lights. Light output is very good and well-focused. Dimmable feature is nice. Just wish there was an in-line switch in the actual cord as that is much more convenient than reaching up onto the wall to turn it on or off. Pretty easy to mount, but I put in better screws directly into a stud, so I don't know how well the mounting will hold up over time if it was just into sinks in drywall.
customer_reviews.author: Cram45

customer_reviews.title: This is a GREAT reading light!
customer_reviews.text: I got this light for my wife as we read before sleeping and she is really happy with it! I thought it was a little high priced but it is Worth every penny! I Love the way you just run your finger over the switch to turn it on And I usually go to sleep Before her so I thought that this light would bother me but that isn't the case with this light as it has a concentrated beam that doesn't bother you even if your snuggled up close! I would like to get one for me too but my old clunker is working for now. Thanks so much! Warren in Montana
customer_reviews.author: warren Oie

customer_reviews.title: Great light for the money
customer_reviews.text: Installation was a breeze. I got it for my wife. Before I got it she was using her nightstand lamp, which caused her to lean over the side of the bed. I put this on the wall inbetween us. She loves it. She can now sit up correctly when she reads at night. I have not had any major issues with the neck. It moves where we need it to and stays for the most part where we want it to. It's very easy to turn on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Mark J. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great little lamp!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these and they've been great! They were easy to install and have stayed secured through the first few months of daily use. It did take a bit of patience to figure out how to go from night light to full illumination to off and then to either dim or brighten. But once that's figured out then it's been great. It was a little difficult to get the back off of one of the lamps so it could be mounted. It's not terrifically intuitive but with some jiggling it eventually came off.
customer_reviews.author: Judith M. Heher

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought two to mount as reading lights over the bed. Installation was fast and easy. With their placement above the headboard the brightest setting is a bit of overkill for reading. Fortunately, the dimmer setting is ideal and it can easily be set as the default level. I cannot imagine ever using the blue nightlight feature so the inability to permanently disable it is an annoyance as you must cycle through it to turn on the light. Beyond that minor issue, I am quite pleased with the lights.
customer_reviews.author: Plum Crazy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to mount, flexible to position
customer_reviews.text: Needed a wall mounted light near new location for my sewing machine to provide additional light. This advertised easy mounting, and it was indeed. Minutes to mount, including pre drilling in knotty pine paneling. I spent more time deciding exacting which height and distance from machine than actually mounting it. Light is very focused and a narrow beam. Wish it was slightly broader area covered, but -- wall mounting, with flexibility to direct the light where I needed it was more important.
customer_reviews.author: Jean P

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this. I built my own headboard and got annoyed with the lamps on my nightstand taking up space so I got these and installed them on my headboard. Night light is bright but not annoying as it is a blue light reading light stays on selected area and won’t irritate your significant other.
customer_reviews.author: Kielha

customer_reviews.title: Only 1 complaint...
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this light has been great. Bright, responsive, sleek, decently priced. However if I were going to change anything about it, it would be a more sturdy way of mounting it. We've had it about 2 months now, we turn it on around 1-2 times a week, and I've had to re-hang it 3 times because it falls out of the wall, mainly when adjusting the goose neck when using it. I have confidence in my ability to install things like this, but it seems to be slightly poor engineering for how it's designed for mounting on the wall. It's still a worth-while product if you don't plan on moving the neck a ton.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Great Light!  Adjustable brightness.
customer_reviews.text: The light works really well! The light temperature is perfect for reading, and the spread is perfect for my needs. My wife and I both have 1 on each side of the bed. The second light had a defective arm that would not stay in place. A replacement was sent out right away, and that one works perfectly. I don't understand the purpose of the bright blue nightlight though. It can be shut off easy enough, but it just seems odd to me. I would have given 5 stars had one of the lights not been defective. I definitely recommend, and plan on buying them again for my children.
customer_reviews.author: Micheal C.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Had the light mounted perfectly over my bed and it broke after one month. The light no longer turns on. Tried plugging and unplugging and that didn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Super bright even on lowest level
customer_reviews.text: This is a very useful light to have on the wall by the bed. It was a small pain to install into the wall with tiny little screws but overall not too terrible. I like the blue night light for calming and the dimmability of the light. I reduced the stars because even in the lowest setting of the light, it's still quite bright. This low setting is so bright it spills over onto my husband's pillow on the other side of a king sized bed and keeps him awake. Makes me feel hurt to use it to read once he goes to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Genetics

customer_reviews.title: Weak mount ruins a good light
customer_reviews.text: I mounted this on the side of my recliner back to use as a reading light. The mount will not stay attached to the base. Any little bump separates the mount from the base and the light falls to the floor
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Like the hotels
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love with this type of lamp when they were installed over the beds at a hotel stay. After a recent stay, I decided to get this one for home. The night light feature is a nice extra as it does not wake my husband. It gives more light and more diffuse light than the hotel lamps, but for me this is okay. I’m still able to angle it so that it does not disturb my husband when he is sleeping, but I can also angle it when I need light beyond just reading. It doesn’t have the USB port, but I appreciate having the touch controlled dimmer more than I miss that.
customer_reviews.author: Lana Banana

customer_reviews.title: Works great - very functional and like ability to adjust
customer_reviews.text: This little light was just what I needed to allow me to read books in bed and not disturb my wife. I can direct the light in just the right manner. It also has a dimming feature which works well but don't expect a large difference when dimming the bulb - I find many LED bulbs don't dim as much as the old incandescent bulbs so that is to be expected here also. Was also easy to mount to the wall - will be two small holes that are easy to repair should I take the light down some day.
customer_reviews.author: randerso

customer_reviews.title: Throws a wierd light
customer_reviews.text: I like this light. Something like when you think your orange cat with a weird blotch of black on one side is cute. The light is mine now, it's installed, and sort of does what I wanted it to. That said; the light is weirdly other worldly, I don't know why they made the switch so that one must hit it twice to turn the light on, and it's kinda ugly... in its unobtrusive way. But I really do like it. Like a pet!
customer_reviews.author: zephyr 2

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in all aspects.  Homerun!
customer_reviews.text: Mounted to headboard for reading Light. 1st night using so time will tell quality. Feels high quality. Very easy and secure mounting system. Great looking finish. Does not look cheap. Light color is excellent. I had to go back to description to verify this was led and not halogen or zenon. I have experience with led color temp problems, and I'm very impressed with this light color. Night light is actually a very nice and useful touch also. Highly recommend at this point
customer_reviews.author: Cat man

customer_reviews.title: Avoid bumping in the night!
customer_reviews.text: The product works fine, and it’s nice that it has a blue night light that turns on and off. The sleek design is aesthetic and clean. My only complaint are the instructions. They are written in broken English and the grammar is terrible, though it did give me a good laugh: “Blue night light create a relax atmosphere and help you see around, avoid bumping in the night.” What if we want to bump in the night?
customer_reviews.author: CWoodClimb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect small beam light.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought a couple different styles of bedside lights. This one has been the best. Easy to install. The cord is long enough to reach the wall socket. The light is directable and doesn’t light up the whole room so my wife is not disturbed when I read in the middle of the night. I no longer have to search for a good reading light. This one does the job for me.
customer_reviews.author: Diane O.

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure what to expect, but this lamp is well made and works perfectly. After installing it, it is solid and works as advertised. I love the blue light which can be left on or turned off and the dimming and brightening feature is great and works well. The flexible arm is the perfect length and allows you to customize the location/direction of the lamp. Love this product. It is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: BillybobW530

customer_reviews.title: Great focused beam of light.
customer_reviews.text: Mounted it on my wooden headboard. This light is Great. Touch the button lightly and the very light blue night lite comes on. Touch again and hold and the lite builds to its brightest level. Touch again and its off. Come back and touch the button twice and it builds to the level you last enjoyed.
customer_reviews.author: n. angel

customer_reviews.title: Nicely Made -remember the screws
customer_reviews.text: Well made with night light option and direct beam warm white light. WATNING - for those who miss this is to be screwed in to bedside table or head rest - I screwed it in to a decorative block of wood from HW store and use as a table lamp - did not want to ruin my nice furniture.
customer_reviews.author: T. Dubbs

customer_reviews.title: easy installation. it would be nice if the light ...
customer_reviews.text: easy installation. it would be nice if the light could be focused more directly. There is still quite a bit of ambient light thrown off from the lamp. But it works very well and is attractive
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Mom

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and solid quality of this lamp - surprisingly, it seems more durable than it looks. I've been twisting/adjusting the neck on the first one I bought with no problem, and this is the second I've bought. I find the light a bit too bright and haven't figured out how to adjust it lower so just have it less directly on the book I'm reading in bed.
customer_reviews.author: L.A. Peep

customer_reviews.title: Touch-activated would be better
customer_reviews.text: Light is very focused and excellent for reading. It looks nice. However, mounted where it is likely to be mounted -- behind the bed -- makes for some awkward contortions to turn the button on and off. I guess I thought this was touch-activated, so my mistake for not reading closer. It is good enough to keep, although the position of the button means that it will not get used as much as it would otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Earl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value and functionality
customer_reviews.text: This light is great for reading in bed. It dims way down to give just enough light and prevent eye strain or gets quite bright when needed. It is simple and fast to mount securely. The flexible neck holds exactly where you place it. The touch control works simply. This is an excellent value and functions better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for reading in bed
customer_reviews.text: No harsh light to wake up your significant other. My husband wakes a lot in the middle of the night and will read to try to fall back asleep. His old book light would wake me every time...this one doesn't cause this response at all. We liked it so much we bought a second one for me! Nice gooseneck allows perfect placement and to be pushed out of the way when not in use. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LisaD

customer_reviews.title: Great light. Consider how you mount it.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. The light is perfect for reading -- doesn't disturb your partner in bed. Also love the dimming capability and nightlight. Well made - machined metal. The only thing that might be improved will be the footprint of the base -- about 3 inches -- because the two mounting screws are close together and not as secure when going into drywall. Hit a stud if you have a choice.
customer_reviews.author: trinidadio

customer_reviews.title: Great for "in-bed" reading light
customer_reviews.text: This is a very attractive light and was easy to attach to the wall beside my bed. The flexible light shaft makes it simple to aim the light wherever it is needed. The only thing is that it doesn't dim as stated in the description. No matter what I do it goes from full on to full off. That is not really an issue for me, but might be for some folks.
customer_reviews.author: DuaneD

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking, replacement unit is working great
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking, but first unit stopped working in less than 24 hours . Awaiting replacement, will update if the next one works. ********* Update: i did receive a replacement from Amazon (didn't go through the seller) and it has worked fine for months now. Upgraded from 2 to 4 stars. (It is just a reading light...)
customer_reviews.author: Gregg

customer_reviews.title: This light is not dimmable.
customer_reviews.text: I like the light. It has two settings: Has a very dim blue light around the on/off switch which is enough to see things and has a bright white light which is fairly tightly focused and doesn't bother or wake up my spouse when I read late at night. As for being dimmable, the light I received are not dimmable, they are either on or off or the dim blue switch is lit.
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: Well built and nice warm light color
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, well made light. I don't care for the blue nightlight - wish I could disable it but it easy to skip past that mode. Also wish the light would go a little dimmer than the preset range. Still, I bought a second one for my wife's side and we both like them.
customer_reviews.author: Big Eric

customer_reviews.title: Works well once installed
customer_reviews.text: The light itself works great but if you can't hit a wall stud the hardware anchors provided are not sturdy enough to hold the light fixture in place. I purchased self-drilling drywall anchors at my local big box hardware store and they did the trick. Once installed it's a definite five star product. My wife has plenty of light to read by while there is no residual light that you would have from a traditional reading lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Malz

customer_reviews.title: Saved our marriage
customer_reviews.text: For years I have been griping at my wife because she likes to read in bed, sometimes into the early hours. I finally got up the gumption to look for a good reading light and I found one. This is an excellent piece of equipment, pretty easy to install and works perfectly. I highly recommend it and, in fact, am going to get another set to install at our summer home.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, nice functional light
customer_reviews.text: Great light, like the night light feature. Nice long hold to go directly from night light (blue ring) to off or single tap to go to reading light. My only (very minor) complaint, is I wish it allowed for running the wire out of the back (I drilled a hole through the headboard and rather than seeing the wire (barely), it is could be completely covered up.
customer_reviews.author: T. A. Engle

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What we Needed!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I both underwent ocular lens replacement surgery due to cataracts. For this reason, we needed brighter night lights to read by in our bed. We did a lot of reasearch on wall-mounted hi-intensity reading lamps, and these lights seemed to fit our needs the best. We have not been disappointed! These lights are extremely high quality, easy to mount, secure on the wall, and easy to control. Their intensity control is superb, ranging from a dim "night light" level all the way up to "rock star spotlight level" (which we tend to use the most). Overall, we couldn't be more pleased! We will see how they hold up in the long run...
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth F.

customer_reviews.title: Very functional
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this reading light! We attached it to the bed frame and saves lots of space on the night table. It also has a night light on the back. We ended up buying 4 of these and attached 2 to each bed frame. You just tap the back of the light and it turns on. No switches. I highly recommend these. They come on 2 colors.
customer_reviews.author: MZ

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp and the best customer service ever
customer_reviews.text: The lamp is very solidly made and works very well. We have two of these fitted on top of the beds headboard and they look very nice as well as performing great as a light for reading in bed. I contact their customer service and had the absolutely best experience. They responded quickly and solved all my issues in a flash. It is not often one gets this kind of service. Congratulations.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Nice light for reading while in bed.
customer_reviews.text: This is a cool little light for reading in bed. I mounted it to the upper part of a headboard. Easily puts out enough light in a small area for reading in bed. It's generally behind and above my head, so no glare for the eyes. Night light is cool. Dimmer works fine. You can read fine whatever the intensity of light chosen.
customer_reviews.author: D.B.

customer_reviews.title: Great light, but...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, bright and tight light. Took away one star because of the ridiculously bright blue LED power button light. Unless covered, it lights up the whole room. Why they make these power indicators so bright is anybody's guess.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Bartell

customer_reviews.title: Great lights but too bright for me
customer_reviews.text: Great lights for the money. Easy to install and the on/off button is very responsive. I do wish they were a bit wider spot light. I find the beam to be too focused. My biggest complaint is that they are way too bright for me. I do not need such a bright light while reading in bed. Even though they are adjustable, even the dimmest setting is too much. I think the dimmest setting should be the brightest.
customer_reviews.author: James Bacis

customer_reviews.title: Adaquate Reading Lamp with Nice Features
customer_reviews.text: One thing to know is that this is not a "clamp on" lamp. It attaches to either your wall or headboard with the mounting kit provided which is held by screws. The mounting is easy and is not destructive to either your headboard or wall. This lamp has a very adequate reading lamp as well as a night light feature. I use both.
customer_reviews.author: OldTerry

customer_reviews.title: Tough time dimming
customer_reviews.text: It looked nice, but I had a tough time figuring out how to dim up or down. One time my finger in it dims it up, the next it dims down...then other times just turns off. For the price, I expected something more consistently controlled. Would keep if it didn’t cost so much.
customer_reviews.author: Jess W.

customer_reviews.title: Great bedpost reading lamp
customer_reviews.text: We tried one of these to replace a tired old bedside lamp. A snap to install and easy to use. A focused beam, the brightness is adjustable from quite bright to off. We liked it so much we purchased another one for the other side of the bed. Great for bedtime readers.
customer_reviews.author: PW Morris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bedside reading light
customer_reviews.text: This decision took me a long time, I checked a lot of bedside lights products, but I was not satisfied with the specs and design. Finally, I found the Acegoo product. The design is perfect, the installation is so simply, the power on/off the button is very soft and nice to use. You can choose the light intensity just pressing more or less the button. Excellent purchase, totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Order was incorrect
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two (2) identical lights and received 2 different models with same numbers and one was brushed nickel and the other black. Not sure how to return the unwanted on. The nickel is what we ordered works fine but one of each color not what we want......
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, be prepared to supply your own better screws if going into drywall
customer_reviews.text: Needed a bedside light and this looked he part. Minimal. Black. Metal. Hopefully strong. Arrived on time and I liked the construction. It didn’t feel cheap. The dimmer worked and the button responded to a slight touch. The hardware that it comes with is dismal. The placement I wanted meant it was going to have to be screwed into drywall. I tried the drywall expanders that it came with combined w the suggested included screws and the unit wobbled feably on the wall. Terrible. But I just replaced their screws w my own and it solidly locked into the wall and was firmly adhered. Be prepared to use different screws! Now that it’s installed, it’s working perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Michael be

customer_reviews.title: A step above the rest
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bedside reading lamp to assist in reading where the light isn't that bright. What I like mostly about this like about this light is the blue nightlight feature. The touch button is better than the rocker or dial switch versions of these lights, so you need to look carefully at the photos to make sure you are getting those features. You can set the light to varying brightnesses by the touch of the button. Mounting is easy. The kit come with 2 sets of screws and options to mount to a wood stud or a wall with no studs.
customer_reviews.author: Stevo51064

customer_reviews.title: Nice light but poor quality mounting screws
customer_reviews.text: Like - Sturdy gooseneck and great light. Light is soft white, which makes it very good for reading. Also dimmable. Dislike - The mounting #6 wood screws are poor quality. Several of them broke on me. Purchased "real" screws at local hardware store and finally got it mounted and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: SkyBirdsDad

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't dim enough
customer_reviews.text: The lights look fine and installed fine and work fine. They're definitely bright, and therein lies the problem. At night when one party wants to read and the other does not, you cannot dim it far enough. It stays way to bright. So the "dimmable" part is the weak part. The blue night light feature is convenient, but as another reviewer mentioned, might have been nicer to use a different (warmer) color.
customer_reviews.author: Jaap

customer_reviews.title: Works great as a reading light in RV
customer_reviews.text: good quality for the price. Light stays where you aim it. Nice to have dimming feature. Would buy again. Hard to tell dimensions from the pictures, but the mount is about 3" in diameter. Light is about 1" diameter and flexible stalk is about 18" long.
customer_reviews.author: W. wright

customer_reviews.title: A+ Quality
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what I wanted. The power cord protrudes from the bottom but is easily adaptable to exit from the rear which is what I needed. I opted to mount the light on the bed headboard and easily routed the power cord thru a hole drilled in it then hidden when the light was installed. Wall mount would have been easy and just as neat. The light assembly has an illuminated on / off switch that I found pretty helpful.
customer_reviews.author: gary s perry

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: I wish the warm light was a little more warm and it had a dimmer setting but otherwise this is perfect and exactly what I was looking for. I put it on the side of my desk in my dorm so it can light my bed so I would have better light when doing homework in bed. The light came in quality packaging and didn't take long to put up.
customer_reviews.author: shellie knipfer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these little bed lights
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for each side of the bed and we LOVE them. It has a little blue led "night light" and a reading light. The light is bright enough for reading but limited so it does not disturb your spouse. They are well worth the money. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Jungle

customer_reviews.title: This works wonderfully for my wife reading in bed
customer_reviews.text: This works wonderfully for my wife reading in bed. Good quality and well made. Only suggestion is to find yourself larger screws to attach it. I used longer ones than came with it, since the light will be constantly moved and bent. The screws that came with it are a little short.
customer_reviews.author: JDR

customer_reviews.title: Flawed design
customer_reviews.text: This is a terribly flawed mounting design. The little squat screw to hold the base In place to the metal circle should be on top of the base not bottom. it kept falling from the L tool and also one tiny screw isn’t enough to hold it All up
customer_reviews.author: Sofia A.

customer_reviews.title: no problems, screw a ring to the studs or bed post and hex wrinch the light to the ring and plug up to 120v.
customer_reviews.text: Wow...installed 2 lights within minutes....this is a sweet light. One huge error on detailed product sheet....It says 240V required.......I studied this problem for Americans and looked at the wiring and saw the 120v plug. Problem solved. This is a technical error when corrected will sell more lights that you can imagine.
customer_reviews.author: happy face

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought this one
customer_reviews.text: Was difficult to choose when I was looking to buy a reading bed light, there r so many to choose from But I settled on this one an it is a excellent choice! Easy installation, no brainer touch control an a added cool little blue nite light if needed and If not a touch turns it off...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great design and functionality
customer_reviews.text: This light is great overall. The light is well focused and has a warm color temperature which makes it a great reading light. The mounting system is nice and secure. My only problem is the blue color of the LED. Wish it was just a warm white color so it wasn't so intensely bright but I'm very happy with the light in general so I'm not going to dock it stars for this.
customer_reviews.author: thrawnis

customer_reviews.title: Small but strong
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little light. I needed some illumination at my chair for reading and doing crosswords and this is perfect. It is unobtrusive but still gives me enough light. My chair is in an odd place and I couldn't decide how best to get some light over it. This is just right. The dim to bright isn't much, but I really only need on or off. Thanks for a cool product. Rick Burnham
customer_reviews.author: Rick Burnham

customer_reviews.title: Company is responsive
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these almost 2 years ago. I placed them in the middle of the headboard, so either my partner or I could read on our side of the bed independently. The lights are perfect for reading in bed — dimmable and amply bright. One of them went out recently, but I contacted the manufacturer and they replaced it free of charge. A great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Function Junky

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and perfect for a night light or reading light
customer_reviews.text: I like this light because I can turn it on and not light up the whole room and disturb my wife. Has a blue night light if you have children or in my case grand kids that don't want to sleep in the dark. If you like to read in bed after your spouse is asleep, Has a white light that you can direct were you want it and not light up the whole room
customer_reviews.author: Compleat Gamester Inc.

customer_reviews.title: Died after 10 months.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't even last a year. Was great for 10 months, then just stopped responding to touch. Would have given 5 stars otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Great, simple light-I’m ordering more!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these lights; installation took literally 5 minutes each. The goosenecks appear to be strong, supportive for the light and durable. The touch switch is intuitive and the night light feature is very nice. I will be purchasing more of these lights for the other bedrooms in our home.
customer_reviews.author: Baked alaska

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, light wks well. However theres no cord channel to cover the cord going to the light. If there were i could paint it the color of the wall to hide the cord. As it is you have an obvious black cord going to a relatively nice looking fixture.
customer_reviews.author: rgaryb

customer_reviews.title: Happy and may buy another
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Seems good quality and works as advertised. My only request would be to have a little more powerful light. A dim function with a more powerful light would be good. I am happy, though, and may purchase another.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Bought one, then bought one for my wife
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and value. Touch the on button once for the button to turn blue as a nightlight, touch again to turn off the blue and turn on the light. Flex neck works well and stays in place. Mounts flush to a surface and has a really long powercord.
customer_reviews.author: Perry Horner

customer_reviews.title: Has a BLUE built-in nightlight ring on the switch - didn't mention this in the description
customer_reviews.text: It turns out that this item has a BLUE nightlight ring around the switch - this wasn't mentioned in the description. BLUE light at night is BAD. Am returning the item. Also, gooseneck is very stiff - might eventually pull off the mounting plate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product. May need modification.
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. My only criticism is that the lamp body is held to the mounting plate by a single tiny set screw that is likely to fail if the goose neck is swung to the side. I added a small bracket to the base of the gooseneck to reinforce it.
customer_reviews.author: doctor jazz

customer_reviews.title: Easy Installation, the perfect bedside light!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a light that wouldn't bother my wife as she was going to sleep and could provide a sufficient amount of light to read hobby related books. This did just that. Installation was a breeze(about 2-3 minutes). The provided power cord is very long so getting to the nearest outlet wasn't an issue. The dimmable light is very bright at max setting and can dim to fairly low level. The night light feature is actually brighter in complete darkness than I thought it would be, which is a nice touch, although not really for me. Great product, great price, great functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan B

customer_reviews.title: Just right.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly as advertised. Definitely bright enough...actually, it is a good thing it can be dimmed because it's a bit too bright at 100%. I mounted it on the BACK of the headboard real close to the edge, so that the gooseneck comes around the side (and can also be tucked away if I wanted to hide it). I just ordered a second one for the other end of the king sized headboard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for wall mounting above a bed
customer_reviews.text: This light looks good and is bright. Unfortunately the mounting design makes it unstable to the point that if I apply pressure, it falls off. And I must apply pressure to move the goose neck. This is the worst well-rated product I've ever purchased on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: J6

customer_reviews.title: Great light ... BUT
customer_reviews.text: The flexible arm has very little memory. If you try to mount it with the light in any position other than substantially vertical, the weight of the light will make it droop. I bought three and they all were the same. The light, so far, is exactly as advertised, soft warm, high quality on/off switch, dim-able, everything's great except the light's inability to maintain some positions.
customer_reviews.author: J. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Good product & Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I got three reading lights of this type before and was very satisfied with them. I ordered two more recently, and one of them was broken after a little over one month. The problem apparently happened at the joint between the base and the adjustable tube. I couldn't return since it's outside of Amazon's one-month return window. I tried to contact the seller, and the seller responded quickly by sending me a new one without any charge. Now I'm enjoying the new light again. I wish the problem didn't happen, but I'm very impressed by their customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install in the guest room, in-laws greatly appreciate it
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for our guest room for easy late-night reading. No issues with the lamps at our place. The in-laws liked them so much they bought one for their house, it died after ~3-4 months but the seller replaced it without an issue so no real complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bright
customer_reviews.text: Pros: easy to set up, easy to adjust. Cons: way too bright and very tricky to dim. Even when dimmed it is too bright for people sharing a bed with one reading and one trying to sleep. In fact, I wish it was less bright just for my reading enjoyment.
customer_reviews.author: Liz, CNY

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: I can now read comfortably in bed. Other reviewers complain about the switch. With 30 seconds of practice it's not a problem. Really good reading light. Main gripe is that set screws are too small and cheaply made, so used the others and screwed in onto the headboard. Plug is large, so plan on space for it on an outlet.
customer_reviews.author: David McCauley

customer_reviews.title: Classy and contemporary lights
customer_reviews.text: We wanted to augment our lighting in our suite. A couple of bedside lights we have, but they are not very good for reading. The acegoo bedside lights, have a blue ring light to act as a night light for those who have to get out in the night, the reading light is bright, dimmable, and it remembers the last setting when it is switched on again. The flexible goose neck means no glare off the page. I highly recommend these lights.
customer_reviews.author: kiwi

customer_reviews.title: Nice light.
customer_reviews.text: I like the looks of the light. I attached a piece of wood to the headboard of the bed and then attached the light to it. The light is unobtrusive, unlike my light I previously used. I only wish it was a little dimmer. The light intensity is adjustable, but I just can't get it as dim as I'd like.
customer_reviews.author: REVSMOG

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, good value
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with the quality of this item. Better than I expected - very durable and attractive. Installed on a bedside shelf and it works great. Really like the night light also. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it's great.
customer_reviews.text: lets me read in bed fine, I've no use for the "night light" feature but cool it's there. Installed easy and the cables are nice and long to leave room to "route" around headboard and stuff.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hammonds

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to stay mounted
customer_reviews.text: This light works great, except it won’t stay mounted on the wall. Big disappointment! Poor design.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Holiday

customer_reviews.title: This light is fantastic. The quality is superior
customer_reviews.text: This light is fantastic. The quality is superior, and the features are well thought out. The price for this light is slightly higher than other lights, but in my opinion it is well worth the investment. I will purchase more for the other bedrooms as well.
customer_reviews.author: J. Block

customer_reviews.title: Works Great, Bright, and Adjustable
customer_reviews.text: These lights are working great. Easy to install, bright, and can be adjusted / dimmed if you ant a lower setting. The goose neck design allows you to point the light where you need it.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Perfect - just what I needed. Well made and very easy to install. Lamp cord of adequate length to reach adapter plugged in on my desk about 4 feet away. Night light a nice touch although I don't use it very much. Throws a nice, adjustable beam.
customer_reviews.author: joey cigar

customer_reviews.title: Perfect amount of light
customer_reviews.text: love this so much, that I know have 3 of these lamps. the latest one I bought, came super quickly - I didn't expect it to come until the next day since I ordered it late at night). I bought the first 2 so we wouldn't need an extra lamp on our night stands, and so we wouldn't distrub each other when we were using it. I bought the 3rd one to put over my kids crib. its easy to redirect the light, so i can sneek in and put laudry away, or try and find the pacifier that went missing through out the night
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Hansen

product_meta.title: acegoo Bedside Reading Light, Minimalist LED Bed Reading Lamp Dimmable Touch Switch Headboard Wall Surface Mount Brushed Nickel
feature_bullets: FOCUSED ILLUMINATION - Narrow beam produces a footprint lighting area on your reading page to read by without lighting up whole bedroom, don't disturb your partner
DIRECTIONAL LIGHTING - The easy to position flexible goose neck point the light directly to reading material so as to suit different sit or lie posture in bed for comfortable reading
TOUCH DIMMER SWITCH - Simple touch lamp holder base switch to turn on or turn off light, touch and hold switch to adjust light to your preference reading brightness level
COMFORTABLE SOFT LIGHT - Warm light gives a cozy feeling. We normally use relaxing light in bedroom, it stimulates your eyes to relax more easily compared to cool white light
MINIMALIST DESIGN LAMP - Wall mount or headboard surface mount gives you a clean and neat surrounding. Connects lamp to adapter to start work. UL Listed adapter included

specifications.Switch Installation Type: Surface mount Wall mount Headboard mount
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars819 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
